Text: Oh my Gawd!  How wonderful to get this early version with Jackie Coogan!  Thank you!

Came as a shock that film is a silent movie, should have realised based on 1922 date, however it is a rarity and depicts the 'real-life' of 'unfortunates' based on Dickens' experience within the Rochester & Medway area.
A must for die-hard fans, however if you just want a family film for you and the kids then it's not for you.
Thankyou for uploading Sheila6

Willygofar

Am d/l at present.  What a great surprise find.
Thanks for a top unique upload.
